title: Don't Miss Out! 1-Bed Apt Coming 9/10/22
map_address: 10785 E Exposition Ave near S Havana St
posting_body: One Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit
Two Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit
Welcome Home to Park Place at Expo Apartments
Throughout Park Place at Expo, you will find outdoor amenities such as picnic tables with outdoor grills, and special spots for your four-legged friends to get some fresh air.
Our swimming pool is open during summer months for a quick dip or a nice place to relax and soak up the sun, and we offer a convenient playground area as well.
Check it all out with a tour of Park Place at Expo today!
Use the link below for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 480 Sq.
- Modern Kitchen Appliance Package including Disposal
- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol
- Multiple Community Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills
- Sparkling, Heated Swimming Pool and Sun Deck
- On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400 Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65
